text: Ibrahim bin Saad (3 August 1946 â€“ 15 November 2024) was a Malaysian politician and diplomat. He was also the Chairman of the Board of Directors at the National University of Malaysia. Ibrahim Saad served as the Member of Parliament for Tasek Gelugor from 1995 to 1999. He was Deputy Chief Minister of Penang from 1990 to 1995 and held two deputy minister positions: Deputy Minister in the Prime Minister's Department from May 1995 to November 1996, and Deputy Minister of Transport from November 1996 to 14 December 1999. title: Ibrahim Saad
